statements: SELECT * FROM Leaderboard ORDER BY game_score DESC, player_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_level > 3 ORDER BY game_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_level IS NULL;
SELECT player_id, MAX(game_score) AS max_score FROM Leaderboard GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_level FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_score >= 100 AND game_level < 5;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_level = 3 ORDER BY game_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC, game_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_score FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_level IS NULL;
SELECT player_name, game_level FROM Leaderboard WHERE game_level IS NOT NULL AND game_score >= 200;
SELECT player_name, MAX(game_score) AS highest_score FROM Leaderboard GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM leaderboard l JOIN player_rankings r ON l.player_id = r.player_id ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score < 50 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT rank, player_name, score FROM leaderboard l JOIN player_rankings r ON l.player_id = r.player_id ORDER BY rank DESC, score DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM players WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players p JOIN player_scores ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id JOIN games g ON ps.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players p JOIN player_scores ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id JOIN games g ON ps.game_id = g.game_id WHERE score > 500;
SELECT player_name, game_name, total_points FROM player_scores ps JOIN players p ON ps.player_id = p.player_id JOIN games g ON ps.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_points FROM players;
SELECT game_name, game_genre FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_id, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_scores.game_id = games.game_id;

SELECT player_name, total_points, game_genre, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_scores.game_id = games.game_id WHERE total_points > 1000 AND score > 500;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_id FROM games WHERE game_category = 'Adventure';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players p JOIN player_scores ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id JOIN games g ON ps.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players;
SELECT game_name, game_category FROM games ORDER BY game_category DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, rank_position FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id JOIN games ON rankings.game_id = games.game_id WHERE rank_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rank_position ASC;

SELECT player_name, game_name, rank_position FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id JOIN games ON rankings.game_id = games.game_id WHERE rank_position = 1 ORDER BY rank_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, game_name, total_wins FROM player_stats JOIN game ON player_stats.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player_name, email, registration_date FROM player WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre FROM game JOIN game_genre ON game.genre = game_genre.genre_name;
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01';

SELECT player.player_name, player.email, player_stats.total_games_played FROM player JOIN player_stats ON player.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.total_games_played > 50 ORDER BY player_stats.total_games_played DESC;

SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, player_stats.total_wins FROM player JOIN player_stats ON player.player_id = player_stats.player_id JOIN game ON player_stats.game_id = game.game_id WHERE player_stats.total_wins > 10 ORDER BY player_stats.total_wins DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM game LEFT JOIN game_genre ON game.genre = game_genre.genre_name WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
